mapper.select:
select
from bangdingkongzhiqi15s left join yonghu2s yh on yh.shoujihao=bdkzq.shoujihao left join yonghuguanlizhe14s glz on yh.waijian=glz.yonghuwaijian where glz.guanjiawaijian=#{biaoji}
